repairedDockerfile:
#pull base image

FROM centos:7

MAINTAINER preluoc "pre_luoc@sina.com"

#install git
RUN yum install -y git && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

WORKDIR /root/

RUN git clone https://github.com/Tencent/Tars.git

RUN git clone https://github.com/Tencent/rapidjson.git

RUN cp -r /root/rapidjson /root/Tars/cpp/thirdparty/

RUN yum install -y gcc && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y gcc-c++ && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y make && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y iproute && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y which && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

##安装glibc-devel
RUN yum install -y glibc-devel && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

##安装flex、bison
RUN yum install -y flex bison && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# mysql 支持库
RUN yum install -y ncurses-devel && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum install -y zlib-devel && rm -rf /var/cache/yum


RUN yum install -y perl && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y perl-Module-Install.noarch && rm -rf /var/cache/yum


#中文乱码
RUN yum install -y kde-l10n-Chinese && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN  yum reinstall -y glibc-common

RUN  localedef -c -f UTF-8 -i zh_CN zh_CN.utf8

ENV  LC_ALL zh_CN.utf8


#拷贝资源
COPY res /root/res/

RUN yum install -y wget && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y cmake && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y maven && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y java && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

COPY init /root/init/

COPY entrypoint.sh /sbin/

ENTRYPOINT  ["/bin/bash","/sbin/entrypoint.sh"]

CMD ["start"]

#Expose ports
EXPOSE 8080
